oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Raymond B. Witt correspondence with Benjamin Carmichael, 1966 May 19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Witt, Raymond B., 1915-2000
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Raymond B. Witt to Chattanooga Public Schools superintendent Benajmin E. Carmichael reviewing and evaluation a desegregation plan recently adopted by the school board of Richmond, Virginia.
